resources.string: Here will be information about you
Your email address will be here.
Already have an account? Login in
What is the minimum age you prefer for a chat partner? Enter a number, e.g., 18. This will help us find people you can chat with comfortably.
What is the maximum age you prefer for a chat partner? Enter a number, e.g., 23. This will help us find people you can chat with comfortably.
How would you like to be addressed? Enter your name, nickname, or any preferred label. Ensure it is comfortable and convenient for you.
How old are you? Simply enter a number, e.g., 19. It isn\'t necessary to be entirely truthful (we\'re all 18), but keep in mind that this helps us match you with interesting people.
Please enter a valid email address
Password must contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters
Age must be between 18 and 120 years
Maximum age must be greater than minimum age
Minimum age must be less than maximum age
Name must contain between 1 and 50 characters
